executive.title: Executive Members
executive.description: The Executive Leadership Team at Doha Insurance Group comprises seasoned professionals with deep expertise in insurance, finance, and strategic management. Their leadership ensures the Group’s continued growth, operational excellence, and unwavering commitment to delivering value to stakeholders across local and international markets.

board.title: Board Members
board.description: The Board of Directors at Doha Insurance Group provides strategic oversight and governance, ensuring the highest standards of accountability, transparency, and corporate integrity. Comprising respected leaders with diverse backgrounds in finance, risk management, and international business, the Board plays a vital role in guiding the Group’s long-term vision and sustainable growth.

CoachMark.TotalPolicy: Effortlessly manage all your motor, travel, and medical insurance policies in one place. Keep track of both active and expired ones with ease.
CoachMark.InsuredPolicies: Stay organized with a clear view of all your insurance policies, Tap on any service to instantly view your active and expired policies.
CoachMark.DIGHelpline: Tap this button to access quick support. You can contact the DIG Call Center anytime, get roadside assistance, chat live with an agent, or file medical and motor claims instantly. You can also browse frequently asked questions (FAQ) for guidance.
CoachMark.SOSEmergency: Tap this button to quickly call the emergency services in Qatar for urgent help.
CoachMark.PlusButton: Explore our app to easily generate insurance quotes by streamlining the process, and access services for comprehensive coverage with a simple tap.
CoachMark.Home: Manage your insurance with ease — view your policies, create new quotes, and track incomplete ones, all in one seamless app experience.
CoachMark.Policy: Easily view all your active and expired policies, including details.
CoachMark.Profile: Easily manage and update your account information for smooth insurance management.
CoachMark.Others: Contact us for help or customize your app settings, including language, notifications, and fingerprint authentication.
CoachMark.MedicalCard: Smoothly manage your family or group medical cards with a simple left swipe for easy access and navigation.
CoachMark.MedicalPolicyCard: Easily access Medical Claim of yourself and your family members, offering a clear representation of details for easy reference.
CoachMark.ClaimCard: View list of medical claim (active, rejected, approved). To view claim information tap on the card or Swipe to the left.
CoachMark.TravelHolderScanButton: Effortlessly scan your passport to create a new Travel (Outside Qatar) quotation thereby simplifying the input of necessary holder information.
CoachMark.TravelNewInsuredButton: Easily add new insured members with a simple tap, effortlessly enhancing your family or group insurance coverage for Travel (Outside Qatar) policy.
CoachMark.TravelNewInsuredCard: Access and manage insurance details for all insured, and in addition left-swipe functionality for quick editing or deletion, ensuring total control and flexibility.
CoachMark.TravelScanNewInsuredButton: Effortlessly add new insured members by scanning passports thereby simplifying the policy inclusion process.
CoachMark.MedicalHolderScanButton: Easily scan your Qatari ID to generate a new Individual Medical quote with easy input of required information.
CoachMark.MedicalNewInsuredButton: Easily expand your Individual Medical coverage by adding new insured individuals with a simple tap in our user-friendly application.
CoachMark.MedicalNewInsuredCard: Access and manage insurance details for all insured, and in addition left-swipe functionality for quick deletion, ensuring total control and flexibility.
CoachMark.MedicalScanNewInsuredButton: Effortlessly add new insured members by scanning qatari id thereby simplifying the policy inclusion process.
CoachMark.IncompleteQuot: Effortlessly resume and complete your latest quotation without hassle, ensuring seamless coverage selection.

bmi_tips.underweight_1: Try to include more protein-rich foods like eggs, meat, and legumes.
bmi_tips.underweight_2: Add healthy snacks between meals to increase calorie intake.
bmi_tips.underweight_3: Drink full-fat milk or smoothies to gain calories healthily.
bmi_tips.underweight_4: Focus on strength training to build muscle mass.
bmi_tips.underweight_5: Eat meals regularly and avoid skipping any.
bmi_tips.normal_1: Maintain a balanced diet with vegetables, fruits, protein, and carbs.
bmi_tips.normal_2: Exercise regularly: cardio, strength, and flexibility.
bmi_tips.normal_3: Stay hydrated by drinking enough water daily.
bmi_tips.normal_4: Get 7–9 hours of sleep every night.
bmi_tips.normal_5: Track your weight occasionally to stay on track.
bmi_tips.overweight_1: Walk at least 30 minutes daily to help burn calories.
bmi_tips.overweight_2: Reduce sugary drinks and high-calorie foods.
bmi_tips.overweight_3: Incorporate strength training 2–3 times per week.
bmi_tips.overweight_4: Eat more vegetables and fiber to feel full.
bmi_tips.overweight_5: Get enough sleep to support weight loss.
bmi_tips.overweight_6: Reduce portion sizes gradually, don’t skip meals.
bmi_tips.overweight_7: Stay consistent; small steps lead to long-term results.
bmi_tips.obese_1: Consult a healthcare professional for personalized guidance.
bmi_tips.obese_2: Focus on gradual dietary changes and consistent physical activity.
bmi_tips.obese_3: Track your weight and BMI regularly.
bmi_tips.obese_4: Incorporate both cardio and strength training into your routine.
bmi_tips.obese_5: Avoid crash diets; slow and steady is safer.
